segments.text: Look at those kids sneaking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on that wobbly stool, grabbing as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl's right there, holding out her hand for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so cute how they're teaming up behind the mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's over at the sink, polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling all over, but she hasn't a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, and her shoe's wet, but she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks perfect, like a picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids are going to get a treat without any trouble, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool might tip, but maybe they'll make it down okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just love seeing this little adventure unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reminds me of my own childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope they enjoy those cookies before anyone notices.
segments.speaker: PAR
